3.description: Now serving as Hand of the King while Tywin fights in the Riverlands. Struggling with the challenges of governance.

8.description: Begins forming the plan to create wildfire for the defense of King's Landing. Shows strategic military thinking.

58.description: Leads the defense of King's Landing during the Battle of the Blackwater. Uses wildfire to destroy Stannis's fleet.

62.description: Severely wounded in battle, disfigured by a sword cut across his face. Recovery uncertain.

relationships.Tywin Lannister: Father arrives to save the city

5.description: Captured on the road and taken prisoner by Lannister forces. Hair cut short, disguised as a boy named 'Arry'.

14.description: Taken to Harrenhal as a servant. Witnesses the horrible conditions and torture within the castle.

30.description: Uses her first 'name' with Jaqen H'ghar, choosing the Tickler who tortured prisoners.

47.description: Uses her second name on Ser Amory Lorch after he nearly discovers her identity through a letter.

64.description: Escapes Harrenhal with Hot Pie and Gendry after using her third name creatively to force Jaqen to help them escape.

6.description: Ranging beyond the Wall with the Night's Watch, searching for Benjen Stark and investigating wildling activity.

23.description: Part of the great ranging beyond the Wall. The Night's Watch seeks to learn what happened to the missing rangers.

43.description: Captured by wildlings after being ordered by Qhorin to kill him to maintain his cover. Must prove loyalty to Mance Rayder.

68.description: Successfully infiltrated the wildling army but struggles with divided loyalties as he grows closer to them.

12.description: Wandering the Red Waste with her small khalasar after Drogo's death. Her dragons are growing but still small.

27.description: Arrives at Qarth, the greatest city that ever was or will be. Welcomed by the Thirteen but with hidden agendas.

48.description: Her dragons are stolen and taken to the House of the Undying. She must venture into the mysterious tower to rescue them.

63.description: Successfully rescues her dragons from the House of the Undying, burning the warlocks with dragonfire. Leaves Qarth with ships.

7.description: Still recovering from his fall, now crippled from the waist down. Having strange dreams about a three-eyed crow.

21.description: His wolf dreams are becoming more vivid. He can slip into Summer's mind and experience the world through the direwolf's senses.

relationships.Osha: Wildling servant who understands his dreams

46.description: Theon Greyjoy captures Winterfell. Bran is taken prisoner in his own home by his father's former ward.

61.description: Escapes Winterfell's destruction with Hodor, Osha, Rickon, and the Reed children. Heads north toward the Wall.

10.description: Former smuggler turned loyal knight to Stannis Baratheon. Lost four fingertips to Stannis's justice years ago.

31.description: Leads Stannis's fleet toward King's Landing for the assault. Commands the flagship Black Betha named for his wife.

relationships.Devan Seaworth: His son serving as Stannis's squire

58.description: Survives the destruction of the fleet by wildfire at the Battle of the Blackwater, though barely.

11.description: Returns to the Iron Islands after nearly a decade as Ned Stark's ward. Hopes to win his father's respect and approval.

24.description: Disappointed that his father gives him only one ship while Asha gets thirty. Decides to prove himself by taking Winterfell.

46.description: Successfully captures Winterfell with a small force. Takes Bran and Rickon prisoner, claiming to be Prince of Winterfell.

relationships.Osha: Wildling who seems to serve him

61.description: Burns two boys' bodies and claims they are Bran and Rickon Stark, though the truth is more complex.

stannis-baratheon.name: Stannis Baratheon
aliases: The King in the Narrow Sea

15.description: Robert's middle brother who claims the Iron Throne by right. A hard, dutiful man who grinds his teeth.

25.description: Burns the Seven's sept on Dragonstone and declares for the Lord of Light. Many of his followers are disturbed by this change.

58.description: Leads the assault on King's Landing but is defeated by wildfire and the arrival of Tywin Lannister with the Tyrells.

15.description: Red priestess from Asshai who serves the Lord of Light. Has convinced Stannis that he is Azor Ahai reborn.

29.description: Uses shadow magic to kill Renly Baratheon, though the exact method remains mysterious to witnesses.

16.description: Robert's youngest brother who also claims the throne. Charismatic and well-loved, with the support of the Tyrells.

29.description: Killed in his tent by shadow magic, though witnesses can barely comprehend what they saw.

22.description: Tall, strong woman warrior in Renly's Kingsguard. Mocked for her appearance but skilled with a sword.

29.description: Present when Renly is killed by the shadow. Blamed for his death despite her innocence.

relationships.Catelyn Stark: Only person who believes her innocence

42.description: Swears service to Catelyn Stark and vows to find and protect her daughters.

16.description: Young daughter of Mace Tyrell, married to Renly Baratheon. Beautiful and courteous, brings the power of the Reach.

62.description: After Renly's death, the Tyrells ally with the Lannisters. She is now betrothed to King Joffrey.

39.description: Red-haired wildling woman who captures Jon Snow beyond the Wall. Mocks him for his vows and southern ways.

43.description: Part of the wildling force that Jon must prove his loyalty to. Shows him the ways of the free folk.

68.description: Her relationship with Jon deepens as he struggles between his Night's Watch vows and his mission.

recaps.1: Tyrion arrives in King's Landing to serve as Hand while Tywin fights in the Riverlands.
recaps.2: Arya disguised as 'Arry' travels with Yoren's Night's Watch recruits towards the Wall.
recaps.3: Tyrion begins his tenure as acting Hand of the King, dealing with the city's challenges.
recaps.4: Daenerys leads her small khalasar through the Red Waste, her dragons growing slowly.
recaps.5: Arya's group is captured by Lannister forces. She hides her identity.
recaps.6: Jon ranges beyond the Wall with the Night's Watch, searching for missing rangers.
recaps.7: Bran continues to have strange dreams about a three-eyed crow while ruling Winterfell in Robb's absence.
recaps.8: Tyrion begins preparations for the city's defense, including the production of wildfire.
recaps.9: Arya and other prisoners are taken toward Harrenhal.
recaps.10: Davos Seaworth serves Stannis Baratheon, who claims the Iron Throne by right.
recaps.11: Theon returns to the Iron Islands after years as Ned Stark's ward.
recaps.12: Daenerys arrives at Qarth after wandering the Red Waste with her dragons.
recaps.13: Jon continues beyond the Wall with the great ranging of the Night's Watch.
recaps.14: Arya arrives at Harrenhal and becomes cupbearer to Tywin Lannister.
recaps.15: Stannis burns the sept on Dragonstone and declares for the Lord of Light.
recaps.16: Renly holds court in the Reach with massive support from the lords.
recaps.17: Davos expresses his concerns about Melisandre's influence over Stannis.
recaps.18: Theon is disappointed by his reception on Pyke and his father's plans.
recaps.19: Arya continues serving at Harrenhal, learning its dark secrets.
recaps.20: Melisandre performs rituals and speaks of the coming darkness.
recaps.21: Bran's wolf dreams become more vivid and meaningful.
recaps.22: Brienne serves in Renly's Kingsguard, mocked but skilled.
recaps.23: Jon meets Qhorin Halfhand during the ranging beyond the Wall.
recaps.24: Theon decides to capture Winterfell to prove himself to his father.
recaps.25: Stannis continues his religious conversion and preparations for war.
recaps.26: Arya witnesses the horrible treatment of prisoners at Harrenhal.
recaps.27: Daenerys is welcomed in Qarth by Xaro Xhoan Daxos and the Thirteen.
recaps.28: Jon learns more about the wildling threat from experienced rangers.
recaps.29: Renly is killed by shadow magic in his tent, witnessed by Brienne and Catelyn.
recaps.30: Arya uses her first 'name' with Jaqen H'ghar to kill the Tickler.
recaps.31: Davos leads Stannis's fleet toward King's Landing for the assault.
recaps.32: Theon arrives at Winterfell and takes the castle with minimal resistance.
recaps.33: Brienne is accused of killing Renly but protested by Catelyn.
recaps.34: Arya continues her dangerous game of serving Tywin while hiding her identity.
recaps.35: Bran is taken prisoner in Winterfell by Theon, his father's former ward.
recaps.36: The political situation shifts as various factions react to Renly's death.
recaps.37: Theon struggles to maintain control of Winterfell with his small force.
recaps.38: Stannis gains some of Renly's followers but faces challenges.
recaps.39: Jon is captured by wildlings including Ygritte beyond the Wall.
recaps.40: Daenerys explores Qarth and its wonders, but danger lurks.
recaps.41: Davos prepares for the assault on King's Landing with mixed feelings.
recaps.42: Brienne swears service to Catelyn and vows to find her daughters.
recaps.43: Jon is brought before Mance Rayder and must prove his loyalty to survive.
recaps.44: Political maneuvering continues in King's Landing as war approaches.
recaps.45: Stannis's forces prepare for their assault on the capital.
recaps.46: Theon takes Bran and the other Stark children as prisoners in Winterfell.
recaps.47: Arya uses her second name on Ser Amory Lorch after he nearly discovers her.
recaps.48: Daenerys discovers her dragons have been stolen and taken to the House of the Undying.
recaps.49: Various factions position themselves for the coming battle.
recaps.50: Arya continues to navigate the dangers of Harrenhal.
recaps.51: Jon's infiltration of the wildling forces continues as he gets closer to Ygritte.
recaps.52: Theon's position in Winterfell becomes more precarious.
recaps.53: Bran's connection to his direwolf and his dreams grows stronger.
recaps.54: Preparations for battle intensify across the realm.
recaps.55: Arya makes more dangerous moves within Harrenhal.
recaps.56: Jon deepens his cover among the wildlings while Theon faces challenges.
recaps.57: Daenerys prepares to enter the House of the Undying to recover her dragons.
recaps.58: The Battle of the Blackwater begins with Davos leading the fleet into Tyrion's wildfire trap.
recaps.59: The battle continues with massive destruction from the wildfire explosion.
recaps.60: Tyrion leads the defense of King's Landing during the ground assault.
recaps.61: Winterfell burns as Theon's men desert him, and Bran escapes with the others.
recaps.62: The Battle of the Blackwater concludes with Tywin and the Tyrells saving the city.
recaps.63: Daenerys escapes the House of the Undying with her dragons, burning the warlocks.
recaps.64: Arya escapes Harrenhal with Hot Pie and Gendry using her third name cleverly.
recaps.65: Stannis retreats to Dragonstone after his defeat at the Blackwater.
recaps.66: Theon's fate at Winterfell becomes unclear as various forces converge.
recaps.67: The aftermath of the Blackwater battle reshapes the political landscape.
recaps.68: Jon continues his dangerous mission among the wildlings as winter approaches.
recaps.69: Arya and her companions flee toward an uncertain future.
recaps.70: The war continues with new alliances and enmities formed from the battle's outcome.
